mapper.select: SELECT count(PostID) FROM Post WHERE <if test="option == 'ID'"> userName like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')</if> <if test="option == 'SUBJECT'"> title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')</if> <if test="option == 'CONTENT'"> content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')</if> <if test="option == 'SUBJECT,CONTENT'"> title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')</if> <if test="option == null or option == ''">1=1</if>

select ItemID, PostCateGoryID, userName, title, Content, suggestion, views, UpdateDate, modifyDate, writer from QNA where <if test="option == 'ID'"> userName like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')</if> <if test="option == 'SUBJECT'"> title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')</if> <if test="option == 'CONTENT'"> Content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')</if> <if test="option == 'SUBJECT,CONTENT'"> title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or Content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')</if> <if test="option == null or option == ''">1=1</if> order by PostID desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.update: Update PostReview set views = #{views}, where itemID = #{ItemID};
mapper.delete: delete from PostReview where userName = #{userName} and itemID = #{ItemID};
